特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note the following in light of the ongoing pandemic: assignments will be posted on LUNA throughout the term, along with important announcements about the course -- including which lectures are in person and which are online -- and so it is critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.

* This course will be offered on-demand until Thursday, April 28. After the course registration is finalized, students will be notified of the course implementation format from Friday, April 29 onward.*

トピック.授業外学習2: Depending on the circumstances surrounding the ongoing pandemic, the instructor may conduct sessions in person on campus, or may instead conduct lectures online on Zoom. Information about which lectures will be in person and which will be online will be announced in the first week of April before the first day of class and posted on this course's LUNA page as an announcement (and on this syllabus page). Please note that all assignments will be on LUNA, and important announcements about the course will be posted regularly on LUNA throughout the term. It is therefore critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Reading assignments will be chosen by students, in consultation with the instructor.
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
※kwicへのリンクとなります（在学生のみ閲覧可）

Please note that all assignments will be on LUNA, and important announcements about the course will be posted regularly on LUNA throughout the term.
